continent_id.description: The id of the continent this map belongs to.

continent_name.description: The name of the continent this map belongs to.

continent_rect.description: The dimensions of the map within the continent coordinate system, given as the coordinates of the upper-left (NW) and lower-right (SE) corners.

default_floor.description: The default floor of this map.

floors.description: A list of available floors for this map.

map_rect.description: The dimensions of the map, given as the coordinates of the lower-left (SW) and upper-right (NE) corners.

max_level.description: The maximum level of this map.

min_level.description: The minimal level of this map.

region_id.description: The id of the region this map belongs to.

The Edge of the Mists map in WvW.
The home borderlands of the green worlds in WvW.
At present only a WvW map that houses a jumping puzzle of the same name, Obsidian Sanctum.

The tutorial missions for newly created characters.
